Religious Upbringing

Whether by choice or as the result of a tragedy, you came to call a temple home. During your stay, you were taught the ways of the temple’s faith and encouraged to meditate on spiritual matters. The time you spend here has opened your awareness to the workings of good and evil forces in the world around you.

Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom or Charisma increases by 1.

Divine Awareness. You can cast the spell Detect Evil and Good without expending a spell slot. Once you do so, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.VEQJJR79XIOTMYWO]{Divine Awareness}

Skills. Choose one from: Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion.

Tools. You gain proficiency with one musical instrument or artisan’s tool of your choice.

Languages. Common, plus one of your choice.
